lead.'' 07 Jan 2011 He explained that the previous structure, in which the triumvirate took collective decisions, had slowed down decision making. He said the changes would help clarify the individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company . However, Mr Eric Schmidt reassured investors that he does not expect any`` material change'' in the way the company is run because`` we tend to agree on pretty much everything''.

: With the Blazers in front by seven after LaMarcus Aldridge 's basket with 1:46 remaining, they failed to score on three straight possessions. The Heat converted seven points over that duration to draw even. Reacting to a story about the friendship between Debbie Walsh Wasserman-Schultz, Gabrielle Giffords , and Kirsten Gillibrand , Shani Hilton observes: It's good that the women who are there have been able to support one another, but this is a reminder that women haven't made many inroads in Congress - or the congressional leadership- in nearly a decade. The 2010 election saw the first drop in women in Congress since 1979, from 93 to 90. It was also the first year since 1979 that women

of 7-footer Matt Geiger in the fourth quarter lifted Philadelphia to a 104-90 victory over the Orlando Woolridge Magic in the opener of their Eastern Conference first-round series.`` I am still excited about this game,'' Allen Iverson said. I feel like I could still play another 48 minutes. The crowd was against us and it was just great playing in that kind of atmosphere. This was my first one, and I would love to play in a lot more. `` Ray Allen told me he got 15 minutes of sleep last night, that was 15 more than I expected,'' said 76ers coach Larry Brown, who took his record sixth different organization to the playoffs.``

that Italians' concerns that a combined Fiat-Chrysler may put its headquarters in the United States are overblown. No decision has been made on governance or a headquarters location, he said. Advertisement It was a typical overreaction to an honest reflection of the issues that must be dealt with, Sergio Marchionne said at the Chicago Auto Show. Last week in San Francisco, Sergio Marchionne told reporters that two corporate structures for Fiat and Chrysler don't make sense after the U.S. automaker goes public.

Zahi Hawass said an investigation has been launched to find those behind the theft. The police and army plan to follow up with the criminals already in custody, he added. Should Malta have a consultative referendum on divorce before Parliament votes, or should it have an abrogative referendum after the House decides?
